rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: An inviting entrance hall with natural light and minimalistic decor to adhere to Vastu principles. The layout encourages a positive energy flow into the home.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom with eco-friendly materials, ample ventilation, and west-facing window ensuring good lighting; incorporates sustainable design practices.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Energy-efficient kitchen with natural stone finishes and floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize daylight. Appliances are chosen for low energy consumption.

rooms.name: Living Room/Dining Area
rooms.description: Open living space combining dining and living areas, featuring large west-facing windows that provide ample natural light, ensuring alignment with eco-friendly design and Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows for enhanced daylighting and energy efficiency, aligned with the west-facing orientation of the plot.
Eco-friendly entrance door that minimizes heat transfer while ensuring security.
Balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows to provide natural ventilation and a view of the garden, promoting eco-friendly living.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with west-facing window ensuring ample natural light; eco-friendly design using sustainable materials and insulation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary master bedroom designed for privacy and comfort, integrating Vastu principles by orienting windows towards the west.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Eco-friendly bathroom with water-saving fixtures and natural ventilation; features floor-to-ceiling windows for proper airflow.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space designed to maximize productivity, with large west-facing windows ensuring a bright and airy environment while maintaining privacy.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window that provides ample natural light and promotes energy efficiency.
Private balcony attached to the home office for fresh air and a peaceful view, aligning with Vastu principles.
